description: A Flutter provider class for managing message threads, including fetching threads and sending messages via an API client.

classes.name: MessagingProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier in Flutter that manages message threads, fetches data from an API, and handles sending messages.

methods.name: fetchThreads
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches message threads from the server and updates the internal list.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specific thread and refreshes the thread list upon success.
